title: Figure, "Boy with Grapes", ca. 1950
markings: underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in blue
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Young boy wearing patterned cap and shorts sits crossed-legged, holds bunch of grapes; small circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Boy with Grapes", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-199.
